title: Express Talk: The Fantasy of Place
hero_caption: Hubert Robert. The Obelisk, 1787/88. Gift of Clarence Buckingham.
short_description: This gallery experience, facilitated by educator Sam Ramos, focuses on a large-scale series of European landscapes to explore the allure of time and place as viewed through the lens of fantasy.
description:
This gallery experience, facilitated by educator Sam Ramos, focuses on a large-scale series of European landscapes to explore the allure of time and place as viewed through the lens of fantasy. 

(Please note that the artwork on this page may not be featured during the gallery talk.)
